file_content.text: My death is nothing. My people will die fighting. We will not become slaves of your Empire.
It's out of your hands now.
That's up to them.
There's only one place scrapping with the Empire gets you.
It's time to give up.
I choose death before servitude.
You no longer get a say in the matter.
That's unfortunate.
Then I'm sorry I have to do this.
I understand.
Nothing personal.
You'll change your tune before the Sith are done with you.
We'll see about that.
You're not gonna die, but you'll beg.
Wanna bet? Let's ask them.
Anyone else feeling brave? I'm waiting.
N--no.
Looks like your people'd rather live.
I didn't think so.
Then we have already died.
I've got what I came for. Scurry off, before I change my mind.
Smart. Now, get lost.
We... we are sorry, Shrona.
Cowards....
Sleep tight.
Crawl. In the filth. Where you belong!
Grovel, you worms.
Pathetic. Give me one reason why I shouldn't exterminate you with the rest of the vermin.
Let our septs survive. We will do anything, give anything.
Do not speak! Fight! Fools! Cowards! Fight!
No... honor is not such a terrible thing to lose for our children. I will beg.
Take our money, our possessions, our pride... even our lives, but let our septs survive us.
Pile it up and take a hike.
You've got a deal.
It is all yours.
Seeing your leader broken is all the payment I need.
I don't want your garbage.
Sounds like you're paying me out of my own pocket.
Not good enough.
"No! Please! We-- we will serve! You will have all we can offer-- everything. Let them live."
You give what the Empire should have to purchase with their blood!
We... we are sorry, Shrona.
You are nothing. Dead of cowardice.
Fun, but you shoulda killed 'em anyway.
That was sickening.
This way. The hiding place is not far.
Ravager, you have much to answer for! Yield and meet a quick death.
I'm not the one who should consider surrendering.
I have the upper hand.
There will be no surrender, only retribution.
Good, more fun that way.
We can respect that, right?
This is going to get ugly.
I hear you're quite the fighter. Let's settle this personally, winner take all.
Yield? Come make me.
If you had honor, you would not hide behind prisoners. I refuse.
Think you're going to have to get tough with them, champ.
She thinks she gets a say. Ain't that cute?
You can't.
This isn't our proudest moment.
Keep talking and the only quick death is gonna be theirs.
Treat this real careful.
Harm them and you will find no escape.
Umm, Blizz think fuzzy people kind of scary... like womp rat.
Guess they figure you're bluffing.
Come on, show 'em we mean business.
I don't think scare tactics are working.
They're here. Let's just fight.
Return our sisters and mothers. Now! Before my warriors use your body to show your Sith that they know nothing of fear.
Save your concern for yourself.
Okay, we do this the hard way.
They're only here to get your attention.
I'm not hiding behind anything.
You'll regret drawing it.
They can go when we're done.
They've served their purpose.
I agree.
Kill her. Slowly.
Kill him. Slowly.
Oops.
Wrong answer. [Kill a hostage]
Ahh! Scary! Boss be more careful!
Now, that got their attention.
Cryin' shame.
No more threats.
Please, surrender, before this turns into a blood bath.
I suggest you shut up and kiss the dirt before they have another accident.
Cowards.
I will break you for this!
Wrong answer. [Kill a hostage]
